title: From Here to Eternity
description: At an Army barracks in Hawaii just days before the attack on Pearl Harbor, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife has an affair with the sergeant.

title: Roman Holiday
description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: Shane
description: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.

title: Stalag 17
description: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German POW camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

title: Tokyo Story
description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

title: The Wages of Fear
description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
description: Two showgirls—one searching for a rich husband, the other for true love—embark on a cruise ship to Paris.

title: The Big Heat
description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate that has corrupted his city and targets his family.

title: The Robe
description: In the Roman province of Judea, a Roman tribune commands the unit that crucifies Jesus and is haunted by the experience.

title: Peter Pan
description: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: The War of the Worlds
description: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

title: The Band Wagon
description: A pretentiously artistic director is hired for a new Broadway musical and changes it beyond recognition.

title: The Wild One
description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

title: How to Marry a Millionaire
description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

title: House of Wax
description: A wax sculptor's museum burns down with him inside, only for him to survive and seek revenge using a new technique to create his lifelike figures.

title: Niagara
description: A honeymooning couple gets entangled in the murder plot of a femme fatale and her volatile husband at Niagara Falls.

title: Ugetsu
description: During the civil wars of 16th-century Japan, two ambitious peasants disavow their families to chase dreams of glory and wealth.

title: Julius Caesar
description: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar worries his friend Brutus, who joins a plot to assassinate him.

title: Pickup on South Street
description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a wallet containing top-secret microfilm, making him a target for communist spies and federal agents.

title: Mogambo
description: A love triangle develops in the Kenyan bush between a white hunter, a showgirl, and the wife of an anthropologist.

title: Calamity Jane
description: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

title: The Naked Spur
description: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two untrustworthy strangers.

title: I Confess
description: A priest is suspected of murder but cannot clear his name without violating the seal of the confessional.

title: Monsieur Hulot's Holiday
description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation, where he accidentally creates havoc.

title: Beat the Devil
description: A quartet of international crooks and a couple from Britain attempt to acquire land in Africa rich in uranium.

title: Titanic
description: An unhappily married couple struggles to deal with their problems while on board the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms
description: A ferocious dinosaur, awakened by an Arctic atomic test, terrorizes the North Atlantic and ultimately New York City.

title: Hondo
description: An Army scout protects a woman and her son from warring Apaches in the Old West.

title: Lili
description: A naive young orphan joins a traveling carnival and communicates with a crippled puppeteer through his puppets.

title: It Came from Outer Space
description: An astronomer and his fiancée see a spaceship crash in the desert, but no one believes them until townspeople start disappearing.

title: Call Me Madam
description: A boisterous Washington hostess is appointed ambassador to the tiny European duchy of Lichtenburg.

title: Kiss Me Kate
description: Fred and Lilli are a divorced pair of actors who are brought together by Cole Porter to star in a musical version of The Taming of the Shrew.

title: The Moon Is Blue
description: A young woman is pursued by two men, but remains steadfast in her determination to remain a virgin until marriage, sparking controversy for its frank dialogue.

title: Young Bess
description: The story of the early life of Elizabeth I, from her childhood as an unwanted daughter to her ascension to the throne.

title: The Hitch-Hiker
description: Two fishermen pick up a psychotic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to kill them when the ride is over.

title: Invaders from Mars
description: A young boy sees a flying saucer land in a sand pit behind his house, but no one believes him as the aliens begin taking over the townspeople.

title: Little Fugitive
description: Tricked into believing he killed his older brother, a seven-year-old boy flees to Coney Island.

title: The Cruel Sea
description: The story of the crew of a British corvette and their grueling service in the Battle of the Atlantic during World War II.

title: Genevieve
description: Two friendly rivals enter their antique cars in the annual London to Brighton Veteran Car Run.

title: Knights of the Round Table
description: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is pledged to marry King Arthur, threatening the unity of the Round Table.

title: Angel Face
description: An ambulance driver is seduced by a beautiful but dangerous woman who plans to murder her wealthy stepmother.

title: All I Desire
description: A mother who abandoned her family for a stage career returns years later to reconcile with her husband and children.
